Service Details: Provides pensions and benefits when contributors retire, become disabled or deceased
Eligibility: For complete information on eligibility and the application process for:- Retirement pension,- Post-retirement benefits,- Disability benefits,- Survivor benefits,- Pension sharing, or- Credit splitting for divorced or separated couplesPlease visit the website, call the Toll Free Number, or visit the Service Canada Kelowna Office (located at 106-471 Queensway Ave)
